title: LISTEN: The Debate - Jan 25: Paul Merson and Matthew Upson
description: Paul Merson and Matthew Upson joined David PruttonÂ on The Debate to discuss all the big talking points.
content:
After Jose Mourinho extended his contract at Manchester United until at least 2020, the panel discuss whether the Portuguese's new deal, coupled with the acquisition of Alexis Sanchez, has laid the foundation for a new dynasty at Old Trafford.
Merse and Upson then turn their attention to Chelsea and whether the champions are in crisis after their Carabao Cup semi-final defeat at Arsenal.
The former Gunners duo will assess whether their old club have turned a corner following Sanchez's departure, while, with less than a week to go until Deadline Day, they select their signing of the season so far.
All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.
Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
